TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Tjavatjavang, title = Tjavatjavang, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tjavatjavang} }

S.FORM: Tjavatjavang i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Tjavatjavang. u kasalumaluma' nu Tjavatjavang sa, 132 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 404 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 393 ku tademaw, pakalatu 97%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 11 ku tademaw, pakalatu 3%. u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 88%, Rukai 3%, Bunun 1%, Tayal 1%, zumazuma 3%.

Tjavatjavang i Pingtong a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Tjavatjavang. o kasalomaloma' no Tjavatjavang sa, 132 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 404 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 393 ko tademaw, pakalato 97%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 11 ko tademaw, pakalato 3%. o kasabinacadan, Paiwan 88%, Rokai 3%, Bonon 1%, Tayal 1%, zomazoma 3%.
